main.name: Tharak Sai Bobba
main.description: Graduate Student, Computer Scince @ University of California - Irvine
main.bio:
Actively looking for Software Development Internship roles starting from Summer'22.
I have an overall experience of 2+ years with F5 Networks and Practo.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Master of Science, Computer Science (Networked Systems)
education.description: Courses: Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Machine Learning, Distributed Systems, Systems for ML, Computer Networks
Courses: Data Structures with C++, Pattern Recognition, Computer Architechture, Data Compression, Introdution to Programming, Computer Networks

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed complex application signatures for Bittorent and various VPN, VOIP and streaming media apps.
Designed in-memory caching for URL-CAT component, enhanced message passing between two threads.
Identified deprecated app signatures and refactored classifiers to achieve overall performance gain of 5%.
Improved productivity of team 3 times by developing a signature generation tool from captures using NLP.

work.title: Software Devlopment Intern
description: Optimized the user DB Queries with better indexing practices and attained a performance gain of 8%.
Refactored Invoice generation component on React-SpringBoot, authored automation with 80% coverage.
